title: Rogue Panda Blue Ridge Drop Bar Shims
content:
If you have a Rogue Panda Blue Ridge handlebar harness that youâ€™ve tried to run on a drop bar bike, then you know the shifter cable housing and brake lines can interfere with the clamps. Well, have no fear, the wizard Pandas over in Flagstaff, Arizona have figured out a fix! These 3D-printed Drop Bar Blue Ridge shims ($15) allow you to pass your housing and hoses through the clamp, avoiding any interference. Check out more at Rogue Panda.

The post Rogue Panda Blue Ridge Drop Bar Shims appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
